Texts.Eng: I see you have your own mech! The Vanguard has produced a number of parts that should be compatible with it, and luckily for you, I have the blueprints for them. They're all yours, if you can ^green;find me a ^orange;Salvaged Nano Receptable ^white;while you're ^green;out in space^white;. I need one to repair my own mech...
That's exactly what I needed, thank you. Here's the blueprints I promised you.
